h3_title: Yaoguai Chief - Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud
content: Cloudy Mist and Misty Cloud are another duo that will use different elements to fight you. You'll go up against Cloudy Mist first, who is the creature with the staff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud'.
The content is as follows:
Cloudy Mist and Misty Cloud are another duo that will use different elements to fight you. You'll go up against Cloudy Mist first, who is the creature with the staff.
